title: Grab some treats in the Awesome Games Done Quick Humble Bundle
description: Humble Bundle has teamed up with Awesome Games Done Quick for a bunch of fun games, along with supporting the Prevent Cancer Foundation. Overall it looks like a nice deal if you don't already own the games.

title: Linux Mint 21.3 released with Cinnamon 6.0 and experimental Wayland support
description: One of the easiest Linux distributions to use, Linux Mint, has a major new release available with Linux Mint 21.3 'Virginia' now officially released. This is probably one of their biggest releases in quite some time.

title: Proton Experimental brings fixes for Bayonetta, Ground Branch and more
description: The first update of 2024 for Valve's Proton Experimental has landed, bringing with it new game support along with fixes for multiple games so here's what's new for Linux and Steam Deck.

title: Old World - Wonders & Dynasties is a content-filled DLC out now
description: Old World is easily one of the best 4X games to be released in recent years, that is still quite largely overlooked compared to others in the genre and it only keeps getting better. A big new content DLC Wonders & Dynasties has just been released.

title: The first stable Steam and Steam Deck update of 2024 is here
description: Valve has released the latest Steam Client stable update for both the Steam Deck and Desktop Steam, pulling in all the recent changes like the re-designed Steam Workshop subscriptions system.

title: AYANEO Next Lite with a customized SteamOS-like HoloISO fully revealed
description: AYANEO has now revealed the specifications and pricing for the Linux powered AYANEO Next Lite, which will be using the SteamOS-like HoloISO, although customized by AYANEO for the handheld.
